title_copy.jcr:title: True tobacco taste at a special price.

text_copy.text:
Get the IQOS 3 DUO now and experience tobacco without
smoke smell, fire and ash.

image.alt: Free delivery Delivery is free and only takes 1-3 workdays.

text_876608921_copy.text: * Only during promotional period. New customers receive 3 trial packs of HEETS.

text.text:
HEETS Turquoise
Selection

Enjoy real tobacco with a delicate menthol aroma.

Faster charging due to the firmware update

Update the firmware on your IQOS device in just a few steps.

Compared to cigarettes.*
            Because the tobacco is heated and not burned.

text_1555000338.text: *Average reduction in the levels of a range of harmful chemicals from IQOS (9 so-called “priority toxicants” identified by the WHO) compared to the smoke from a reference cigarette (3R4F). Based on Health Canada's Intense Smoking Regime without nicotine.

text.text:
Try before you buy.

                        Try IQOS for 30 days free of charge and receive 3 trial packs of HEETS.*

text_519351467.text: * Offer incl. 3 trial packs of HEETS only valid for new customers.

text.text:
14,7 million* adult smokers have already switched to IQOS, the smoke-free alternative to cigarettes. 

                            * PMI Financials or estimates, IQOS user panels and PMI Market Research. Status as of July 2021. IQOS users who have completely quit cigarettes and for whom HEETS sticks represent at least 70% of their past 7-day heated tobacco consumption.

HEETS made for IQOS

IQOS and HEETS are the perfect combination to enjoy the real taste of tobacco

image.alt: Free delivery Delivery is free and only takes 1-3 workdays.

text.text:
More to discover with myIQOS

Care you can count on. Priviliges to inspire you.

Get support

Benefit from all-round support and expert tips from the moment you choose IQOS.

Enjoy privileges

Enjoy unforgettable experiences and exclusive rewards in the IQOS Club, as well as our referral program.

Fully protected

Accidental damage coverage, international assistance or firmware update. Discover all our services with myIQOS.
This product is not risk-free and only for adult smokers. HEETS tobacco sticks contain nicotine, which is addictive.
